statements.select:
SELECT CASE T1.BILL_TYPE WHEN 1 THEN '装车入库' WHEN 2 THEN '直接入库' ELSE '' END BILL_TYPE_CAPTION , T1.* , CASE T1.BILL_STATE WHEN 0 THEN '新建' WHEN 1 THEN '已确认' ELSE '' END BILL_STATE_CAPTION , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , T4.SHIFT_NAME IN_SHIFT_NAME , T5.CLASS_NAME IN_CLASS_NAME , T7.USER_NAME UPDATE_USER_NAME , T8.USER_NAME AFFIRM_USER_NAME FROM PSM_IN_STOCK_BILL T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_SHIFT T4 ON T1.IN_SHIFT_ID = T4.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_CLASS T5 ON T1.IN_CLASS_ID = T5.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T7 ON T1.UPDATE_USER_ID = T7.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T8 ON T1.AFFIRM_USER_ID = T8.OBJID
T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
T1.IN_DATE >= #where.BeginDate#
T1.IN_DATE <= #where.EndDate#
T1.RECORD_TIME >= #where.BeginTime#
T1.RECORD_TIME <= #where.EndTime#
T1.IN_SHIFT_ID = #where.InShiftId#
T1.IN_CLASS_ID = #where.InClassId#
T1.BILL_STATE = #where.BillState#
T1.BILL_TYPE = #where.BillType#
T2.USER_NAME like '%' || #where.RecordUserName# || '%'
T1.BILL_CODE = #where.BillCode#
T1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
ORDER BY T1.RECORD_TIME DESC

SELECT CASE T1.BILL_TYPE WHEN 1 THEN '装车入库' WHEN 2 THEN '直接入库' ELSE '' END BILL_TYPE_CAPTION , T1.* , CASE T1.BILL_STATE WHEN 0 THEN '新建' WHEN 1 THEN '已确认' ELSE '' END BILL_STATE_CAPTION , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , T4.SHIFT_NAME IN_SHIFT_NAME , T5.CLASS_NAME IN_CLASS_NAME , T7.USER_NAME UPDATE_USER_NAME , T8.USER_NAME AFFIRM_USER_NAME FROM PSM_IN_STOCK_BILL T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_SHIFT T4 ON T1.IN_SHIFT_ID = T4.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_CLASS T5 ON T1.IN_CLASS_ID = T5.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T7 ON T1.UPDATE_USER_ID = T7.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T8 ON T1.AFFIRM_USER_ID = T8.OBJID
(T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#)

SELECT T1.* , CASE T1.SUMMARY_STATE WHEN 0 THEN '新建' WHEN 1 THEN '已确认' ELSE '' END SUMMARY_STATE_CAPTION , CASE T1.CHECK_GRADE_CODE WHEN 1 THEN '合格品' WHEN 2 THEN '次品' WHEN 3 THEN '废品' WHEN 4 THEN '特废品' WHEN 9 THEN '试验胎' ELSE '无品级' END CHECK_GRADE_NAME , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , T3.IN_DATE , T5.MATERIAL_NAME , T7.USER_NAME UPDATE_USER_NAME , T8.USER_NAME AFFIRM_USER_NAME , T9.CLASS_NAME IN_CLASS_NAME , T10.SHIFT_NAME IN_SHIFT_NAME , T11.STORE_NAME , T12.STORE_PLACE_NAME FROM PSM_IN_STOCK_SUMMARY T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSM_IN_STOCK_BILL T3 ON T1.BILL_ID = T3.OBJID LEFT JOIN SBM_MATERIAL T5 ON T1.MATERIAL_ID = T5.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T7 ON T1.UPDATE_USER_ID = T7.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T8 ON T1.AFFIRM_USER_ID = T8.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_CLASS T9 ON T3.IN_CLASS_ID = T9.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_SHIFT T10 ON T3.IN_SHIFT_ID = T10.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSB_STORE T11 ON T1.STORE_ID = T11.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSB_STORE_PLACE T12 ON T1.STORE_PLACE_ID = T12.OBJID
T1.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND T1.BILL_ID = #where.OBJID#
ORDER BY T3.RECORD_TIME DESC, T5.MATERIAL_NAME
SELECT '1' sskey, '按接班日期' ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '2' sskey, '按创建时间' ssValue FROM dual
SELECT 0 sskey, '未确认' ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT 1 sskey, '已确认' ssValue FROM dual
SELECT 1 sskey, '装车入库' ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT 2 sskey, '直接入库' ssValue FROM dual
SELECT OBJID sskey, CLASS_NAME ssValue FROM SSB_CLASS WHERE DELETE_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY OBJID
SELECT OBJID sskey, SHIFT_NAME ssValue FROM SSB_SHIFT WHERE DELETE_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY OBJID
